title: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
description: The Bachelor of Science (BS) in Information Technology degree program is available offers course flexibility with options taught entirely online, or in-class, or hybrid (50% online and 50% in-class). From software developers and programmers to cybersecurity specialists, a bachelor's degree in IT information technology can prepare you for many solid careers. It can also be an excellent stepping stone to more advanced degrees in the computer technology. The online information technology program offers the most flexibility for students.
careers: Computer Systems Analyst, Database Developer/Administrator, Information Security Analyst, Data Analyst, and System Administrator
